title: His worship, Mr Montreal
creator_credit: Robert Duncan, Marrin Canell, Donald Brittain, James de B. Domville and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A fascinating and spirited portrait of the life and times of the legendary Camillien Houde. Using rare archival footage and recent interviews with ex-colleagues, aides and friends, the film presents a comprehensive profile of this incredible, and, to some, infamous, man.
